card_text: You can activate 1 of these effects.$N●When this card is targeted for an attack: You can banish this card; draw 1 card, then end the Battle Phase.$N●You can target 1 face-up monster you control and this card; banish both those targets, then draw 2 cards.$N●You can target 1 card in your GY; banish both this card and 1 card from your hand, then place that target on top of the Deck.
